name: Papelane
description:
Welcome to our brand new game - Papelane!

Have you ever dreamed of shooting cockroaches and make sure they don't sneak to earth? Of course you did. Papelane is here to make your dream come true.
Papelane is a simple-casual game built for everyone to enjoy it. It has a simple and intuitive user interface and a delightful game experience.

We insist on giving you the best user experience we possibly can and therefore we highly recommend you to report bugs you encounter, suggest new features and contact us if you are unable to understand something.
